chapter.text: 20|2|apani kasta-klese patita hana – e jan'ya amara apanara prati kura'ana nayila karini [1]
20|3|baram ye bhaya kare tara jan'ya upadesa hisebe [1]
20|4|Yini yamina o samucca asamanasamuha srsti karechena tamra kacha theke eta nayilakrta
20|5|dayamaya (allah) arasera upara uthechena [1].
20|6|Ya ache asamanasamuhe o yamine ebam du’yera madhyabarti sthane o bhugarbhe [1] ta tamra'i.
20|7|Ara yadi apani uccakanthe katha balena, tabe tini to ya gopana o ati gopana ta saba'i janena [1].
20|8|Allah, tini chara an'ya kono satya ilaha ne'i, sundara namasamuha tamra'i [1].
20|9|Ara musara brttanta apanara kache paumcheche ki [1]

20|10|tini yakhana aguna dekhalena takhana tara paribarabargake balalena, ‘tomara apeksa kara, ami to aguna dekhechi. Sambhabata ami tomadera jan'ya ta theke kichu jbalanta angara anate parabo athaba ami agunera kache dhare kono pathanirdesa paba [1].
20|11|Tarapara yakhana tini agunera kache asalena takhana take deke bala hala, ‘he musa
20|12|‘niscaya ami apanara raba, ata'eba apanara juta jora khule pheluna, karana apani pabitra ‘tu'oya’ upatyakaya rayechena [1].
20|13|‘Ara ami apanake manonita karechi. Ata'eba ya ohi pathano hacche apani ta manoyogera sathe sununa.
20|14|‘Ami allah ami chara an'ya kono haka ilaha ne'i. Ata'eba, amara'i ibadata karuna [1] ebam amara smaranarthe salata adaya karuna [2].
20|15|‘Keyamata to abasyambhabi [1], ami eta gopana rakhate ca'i [2] yate pratyekake nija kaja anuyayi pratidana deya daya [3].
20|16|‘Kaje'i ye byakti kiyamate imana rakhe na ebam nija prabrtti anusarana kare, se yena apanake tara upara imana ana theke phiriye na rakhe, natuba apani dhbansa haye yabena [1].
20|17|Ara he musa! Apanara dana hate seta ki [1]?’
20|18|Musa balalena, ‘eta amara lathi; ami ete bhara de'i ebam era dbara aghata kare ami amara mesapalera jan'ya gachera pata phele thaki ara eta amara an'yan'ya kaje'o lage [1].’
20|19|Allah balena, ‘he musa! Apani ta niksepa karuna.’
20|20|Tarapara tini ta niksepa karalena, sange sange seta sapa [1] haye chutate lagala
20|21|allah balalena, ‘apani take dharuna, bhaya karabena na, amara etake tara agera rupe phiriye deba.
20|22|‘Ebam apanara hata apanara bagalera [1] sathe milita karuna, ta areka nidarsanasarupa nirmala ujjbala haye bera habe.
20|23|‘Eta e jan'ya ye, amara apanake amadera mahanidarsanagulora kichu dekhaba.
20|24|‘Phira’a'unera kache yana, se to simalanghana kareche [1].’
20|25|Musa balalena [1], ‘he amara raba! Amara baksa samprasarita kare dina [2].
20|26|‘Ebam amara kaja sahaja kare dina [1].
20|27|‘Ara amara jihabara jarata dura kare dina
20|28|‘yate tara amara katha bujhate pare [1].
20|29|‘Ara amara jan'ya kare dina ekajana sahayyakari amara sajanadera madhya theke [1]
20|30|‘amara bha'i harunake
20|31|‘tara dbara amara sakti sudrrha karuna
20|32|‘ebam take amara kaje ansidara karuna [1]
20|33|‘yate amara apanara pabitrata o mahima ghosana karate pari pracura
20|34|‘ebam amara apanake smarana karate pari besi parimana [1].
20|35|‘Apani to amadera samyaka drasta.’
20|36|Tini balalena, ‘he musa! Apani ya ceyechena ta apanake deya hala [1].
20|37|‘Ara amara to apanara prati aro ekabara anugraha karechilama [1]
20|38|‘yakhana amara apanara make janiyechilama ya chila jananora [1]

20|39|‘ye, tumi take sindukera madhye rakha, tarapara ta dariyaya bhasiye da'o [1] yate dariya take tire thele deya [2], phale take amara satru o tara satru niye yabe [3]. Ara ami amara kacha theke apanara upara bhalobasa dhele diyechilama [4], ara yate apani amara cokhera samane pratipalita hana [5].

20|40|‘Yakhana apanara bona calachila, atahpara se giye balala, ‘ami ki tomaderake emana ekajanera sandhana deba ye e sisura dayitbabhara nite parabe?’ Atahpara amara apanake apanara mayera kache phiriye dilama yate tara cokha juraya ebam se duhkha na paya; ara apani eka byaktike hatya karechilena; atahpara amara apanake manahkasta theke mukti de'i ebam amara apanake bahu pariksa karechi [1]. He musa! Tarapara apani kayeka bachara mada'iyanabasidera madhye abasthana karechilena, era pare apani nirdharita samaye upasthita halena.
20|41|‘Ebam ami apanake amara nijera jan'ya prastuta kare niyechi [1].
20|42|‘Apani o apanara bha'i amara nidarsanasaha yatra karuna ebam amara smarane saithilya karabena na [1]
20|43|‘apanara ubhaye phira’a'unera kache yana, se to simalanghana kareche.
20|44|‘Apanara tara sathe narama katha balabena [1], hayata se upadesa grahana karabe athaba bhaya karabe [2].
20|45|Tara balala, ‘he amadera raba! Amara asanka kari se amadera upara barabari karabe athaba an'yaya acarane simalanghana karabe [1].
20|46|Tini balalena, ‘apanara bhaya karabena na, ami to apanadera sange achi [1], ami suni o ami dekhi.

20|47|Sutaram apanara tara kache yana ebam baluna, ‘amara tomara raba era rasula, kaje'i amadera sathe bani isara'ilake yete da'o ebam taderake kasta di'o na, amara to tomara kache enechi tomara rabera kacha theke nidarsana. Ara yara satpatha anusarana kare tadera prati santi.
20|48|‘Niscaya amadera prati ohi pathano hayeche ye, sasti to tara jan'ya ye mithya aropa kare o mukha phiriye neya.
20|49|Phira’a'una balala, ‘he musa! Tahale ke tomadera raba [1]?’
20|50|Musa balalena, ‘amadera raba tini, yini pratyeka bastuke tara srsti akrti dana karechena, tarapara pathanirdesa karechena [1].
20|51|Phira’a'una balala, ‘tahale atita yugera lokadera abastha ki [1]?’
20|52|Musa balalena, ‘era jnana amara rabera nikata kitabe rayeche, amara raba bhula karena na ebam bismrta'o hana na [1].

20|53|‘Yini tomadera jan'ya yaminake karechena bichana ebam tate kare diyechena tomadera jan'ya calara patha, ara tini akasa theke pani barsana karena. Atahpara ta diye amara bibhinna prakarera udbhida utpanna kari [1].
20|54|Tomara kha'o o tomadera gabadi pasu cara'o; abasya'i ete nidarsana ache bibekasampannadera jan'ya [1].
20|55|Amara mati theke [1] tomaderake srsti karechi, tate'i tomaderake phiriye deba ebam ta theke'i punarbara tomaderake bera karaba [2].
20|56|Ara amara to take amadera samasta nidarsana dekhiyechilama [1]; kintu se mithyaropa kareche ebam aman'ya kareche.
20|57|Se balala, ‘he musa! Tumi ki amadera kache esecha tomara jadu dbara amaderake desa theke bahiskara kare deyara jan'ya [1]

20|58|tahale amara'o abasya'i tomara kache upasthita karaba era anurupa jadu, kaje'i amadera o tomara madhye sthira kara eka nirdista samaya eka madhyabarti sthane, yara byatikrama amara'o karaba na ebam tumi'o karabe na.’
20|59|Musa balalena, ‘tomadera nirdharita samaya hala utsabera dina ebam yate sakale'i janaganake samabeta kara haya [1].’
20|60|Atahpara phira’a'una prasthana kare tara yabatiya kausalasaha ekatra karala [1], tarapara se asala.

20|61|Musa taderake balala, ‘durbhoga tomadera! Tomara allahara upara mithya aropa karo na. Karale, tini tomaderake sasti dbara samule dhbansa karabena. Ara ye mithya udbhabana kareche se'i byartha hayeche [1].
20|62|Takhana tara nijedera madhye nijedera kaja sambandhe bitarka karala [1] ebam tara gopane paramarsa karala.
20|63|Tara balala, ‘e dujana abasya'i jadukara, tara caya tadera jadu dbara tomaderake tomadera desa theke bahiskara karate [1] ebam tomadera utkrsta jibana pad'dhati dhbansa karate [2].
20|64|‘Ata'eba tomara tomadera kausala (jadukriya) jogara kara, tarapara saribad'dha haye upasthita ha'o. Ara aja ye jayi habe se-i saphala habe [1].
20|65|Tara balala, ‘he musa! Haya tumi niksepa kara natuba amara'i prathama niksepakari ha'i [1].
20|66|Musa balalena, ‘baram tomara'i niksepa kara. Atahpara tadera jadu-prabhabe hathat musara mane hala tadera dari o lathigulo chutochuti karache [1].
20|67|Takhana musa tara antare kichu bhiti anubhaba karalena [1].
20|68|Amara balalama, ‘bhaya karabena na, apani'i upare thakabena.
20|69|‘Ara apanara dana hate ya ache ta niksepa karuna, eta tara ya kareche ta kheye phelabe [1]. Tara ya kareche ta to sudhu jadukarera kausala. Ara jadukara yekhane'i asuka, saphala habe na.
20|70|Atahpara jadukarera sajadabanata ha'o [1], tara balala, ‘amara haruna o musara rabera prati imana analama.

20|71|Phira’a'una balala, ‘ami tomaderake anumati deyara age'i tomara musara prati bisbasa sthapana karale! Se to tomadera pradhana ye tomaderake jadu siksa diyeche [1]. Kaje'i ami to tomadera hata-pa biparita dika theke kataba'i [2] ebam ami tomaderake khejura gachera kande sulibid'dha karaba'i [3] ara tomara abasya'i janate parabe amadera madhye kara sasti kathoratara o adhika sthayi [4].

20|72|Tara balala, ‘amadera kache ye sakala spasta nidarsana eseche tara upara ebam yini amaderake srsti karechena tamra upara tomake amara kichute'i pradhan'ya deba na. Kaje'i tumi ya sid'dhanta neyara nite para. Tumi to sudhu e duniyara jibanera upara katrtba karate para [1].
20|73|‘Amara niscaya amadera rabera prati imana enechi, yate tini ksama karena amadera aparadha ebam tumi amaderake ye jadu karate badhya karecha ta [1]. Ara allah srestha o sthayi.
20|74|Ye tara rabera kache aparadhi haye upasthita habe tara jan'ya to ache jahannama, sekhane se marabe'o na, bamcabe'o na [1].
20|75|Ara yara tamra kache satkarma kare mumina abasthaya asabe, tadera jan'ya'i rayeche uccatama maryada.
20|76|Sthayi jannata, yara padadese nadi prabahita, sekhane tara sthayi habe ebam eta tadera'i puraskara yara parisud'dha haya.

20|77|Ara amara abasya'i musara prati ohi karechilama e marme ye, amara bandaderake niye rate bera hana sutaram apani tadera jan'ya sagarera madhya diye eka suska pathera byabastha karuna, pichana theke ese dhare phelara asanka karabena na ebam bhaya'o karabena na [1].
20|78|Atahpara phira’a'una tara sain'yabahinite tadera pichane chutala, tarapara sagara taderake sampurnarupe nimajjita karala [1].
20|79|Ara phira’a'una tara sampradayake pathabhrasta karechila ebam satpatha dekhayani.

20|80|He bani isara'ila! Amara to tomaderake satru theke ud'dhara karechilama, ara amara tomaderake pratisruti diyechilama tura parbatera dana pase [1] ebam tomadera upara manna o sala'oya nayila karechilama [2]

20|81|tomaderake amara ya riyika dana karechi ta theke pabitra bastusamuha kha'o ebam e bisaye simalanghana karo na, karale tomadera upara amara krodha apatita habe. Ara yara upara amara krodha apatita habe se to dhbansa haye yaya.
20|82|Ara ami abasya'i ksamasila tara prati, ye ta'oba kare, imana ane ebam satkaja kare tarapara satpathe abicala thake [1].
20|83|He musa! Apanara sampradayake pichane phele apanake tarahura karate badhya karala ke
20|84|tini balalena, tara to amara pichane'i ache [1]. Ara he amara raba! Ami taratari apanara kache asalama, apani santusta habena e jan'ya.
20|85|Tini balalena, amara to apanara sampradayake pariksaya phelechi apanara cale asara para. Ara sameri [1] taderake pathabhrasta kareche.’

20|86|Atahpara musa tara sampradayera kache phire gelena krud'dha o ksubdha haye [1]. Tini balalena, ‘he amara sampradaya! Tomadera raba ki tomaderake eka uttama pratisruti denani [2]? Tabe ki pratisruti kala tomadera kache sudirgha hayeche [3]? Na tomara ceyecha tomadera prati apatita hoka tomadera rabera krodha [4], ye karane tomara amake deya angikara [5] bhanga karale

20|87|tara balala, ‘amara apanake deya angikara sbecchaya bhanga karini [1]; tabe amadera upara capiye deya hayechila lokera alankarera bojha. Ta'i amara ta agune niksepa kari [2], anurupabhabe sameri'o (sekhane kichu mati) niksepa kare.
20|88|‘Atahpara se tadera jan'ya garalo eka bachura, eka abayaba ya hamba raba karata.’ Takhana tara balala, e tomadera ilaha ebam musara'o ilaha, atahpara se (musa) bhule geche [1].
20|89|Tabe ki tara dekhe na ye, ota tadera kathaya sara deya na ebam tadera kono ksati ba upakara karara ksamata'o rakhe na [1]

20|90|abasya haruna taderake age'i balechilena, ‘he amara sampradaya! E dbara to sudhu tomaderake pariksaya phela hayeche. Ara tomadera raba to dayamaya; kaje'i tomara amara anusarana kara ebam amara adesa mene cala.
20|91|Tara balechila, ‘amadera kache musa phire na asa paryanta amara kichute'i era puja hate birata haba na.
20|92|Musa balalena, ‘he haruna! Apani yakhana dekhalena tara pathabhrasta hayeche takhana kise apanake badha dila
20|93|‘amara anusarana kara hate? Tabe ki apani amara adesa aman'ya karalena [1]

20|94|haruna balalena, ‘he amara sahodara! Amara dari o cula dharabe na [1]. Ami asanka karechilama ye, tumi balabe, ‘apani bani isara'iladera madhye bibheda srsti karechena o amara katha sunaya yatnabana hanani.’
20|95|Musa balalena, ‘he sameri! Tomara byapara ki

20|96|Se balala, ‘ami ya dekhechilama tara ta dekheni, tarapara ami se dutera padacihna hate ekamuthi mati niyechilama tarapara ami ta niksepa karechilama [1]; ara amara mana amara jan'ya sobhana karechila erupa kara.

20|97|Musa balalena, ‘ya'o; tomara jibaddasaya tomara jan'ya eta'i ra'ilo ye, tumi balabe, ‘ami asprsya [1] ebam tomara jan'ya ra'ila eka nirdista samaya, tomara belaya yara byatikrama habe na. Ara tumi tomara se ilahera prati laksya kara yara pujaya tumi rata chile; amara setake jbaliye deba'i, tarapara setake biksipta kare sagare chariye deba'i.
20|98|Tomadera ilaha to sudhu allaha'i yini chara an'ya kono satya ilaha ne'i, sabakichu tamra jnanera paridhibhukta.
20|99|Purbe ya ghateche tamra kichu sambada amara ebhabe apanara nikata barnana kari. Ara amara amadera nikata hate apanake dana karechi yikara [1].
20|100|Eta theke ye bimukha habe, abasya'i se kiyamatera dina mahabhara bahana karabe [1].
20|101|Setake tara sthayi habe ebam kiyamatera dina tadera jan'ya e bojha habe kata manda
20|102|yedina singaya [1] phumka deya habe ebam yedina amara aparadhiderake nilacaksu tatha drstihina abasthaya samabeta karaba [2].
20|103|Sedina tara cupisare paraspara balabali karabe, ‘tomara matra dasadina abasthana karechile.’
20|104|Amara bhalabhabe'i jani tara ki balabe, tadera madhye ye apeksakrta uttama pathe chila (bibekabana byakti) se balabe, ‘tomara matra ekadina abasthana karechile.’
20|105|Ara tara apanake parbatasamuha samparke jijnesa kare. Baluna, ’amara raba eguloke samule utpatana kare biksipta kare debena.
20|106|Tarapara tini take parinata karabena masrna samatala mayadane
20|107|‘yate apani baka o umcu dekhabena na [1].’

20|108|Sedina tara ahbanakarira anusarana karabe, e byapare edika odika karate parabe na. Ara dayamayera samane samasta sabda stabdha haye jabe; kaje'i mrdu dhbani [1] chara apani kichu'i sunabena na.
20|109|Dayamaya yake anumati debena o yara kathaya tini santusta habena, se chara karo suparisa sedina kono kaje asabe na [1].
20|110|Tadera sam'mukhe o pascate ya kichu ache, ta tini abagata, kintu tara jnana dbara tamke bestana karate pare na.
20|111|Ara ciranjiba, cirapratisthita- sarbasattara dharakera kache saba'i habe nimnamukhi ebam se'i byartha habe, ye yuluma bahana karabe [1].
20|112|Ara ye mumina haye satkaja kare, tara kono asanka ne'i abicarera o an'ya kono ksatira.

20|113|Ara ebhabe'i amara kura'anake nayila karechi arabi bhasaya ebam tate bisadabhabe bibrta karechi satarkabani, yate tara taka'oya abalambana kare athaba eta tadera madhye smaranikara utpatti kare.

20|114|Sutaram prakrta malika allah ati mahana sarbocca sattba [1]. Ara apanara prati allahara ohi sampurna ha'oyara age apani kura'ana pathe tarahura karabena na ebam baluna, ‘he amara raba! Amake jnane samrd'dha karuna.
20|115|Ara amara to itopurbe adamera prati nirdesa dana karechilama, kintu tini bhule giyechilena; ara amara tara madhye sankalpe drrhata pa'ini [1].
20|116|Ara smarana karuna [1], yakhana amara phirisataganake balalama, ‘tomara adamera prati sajada kara, takhana ibalisa chara saba'i sijada karala; se aman'ya karala.
20|117|Atahpara amara balalama, ‘he adama! Niscaya e apanara o apanara strira satru, kaje'i se yena kichute'i apanaderake jannata theke bera kare na deya [1], dile apanara duhkha-kasta pabena [2].
20|118|‘Niscaya apanara jan'ya e byabastha ra'ila ye, apani jannate ksudharta'o habena na, nagna'o habena na
20|119|‘ebam sekhane pipasata habena na. Ara rode'o akranta habena na [1].
20|120|Atahpara sayatana theke take kumantrana dilo; se balla,’he adama! Ami ki apanake bale deba ananta jibanadayini gachera katha o aksaya rajyera katha [1]?’

20|121|Tarapara tara ubhaye se gacha theke bhaksana karala; takhana tadera lajjasthana tadera kache prakasa haye parala ebam tara jannatera gachera pata diye nijederake dhakate lagalena. Ara adama tara rabera hukuma aman'ya karalena phale tini pathabhranta haye gelena [1].
20|122|Tarapara tara raba take manonita karalena [1], atahpara tara ta'oba kabula karalena o take pathanirdesa karalena.

20|123|Tini balalena, ‘tomara ubhaye ekasathe jannata theke neme ya'o. Tomara paraspara parasparera satru. Pare amara paksa theke tomadera kache satpathera nirdesa asale ye amara pradarsita satpathera anusarana karabe se bipathagami habe na o duhkha-kasta pabe na.
20|124|‘Ara ye amara smarana theke bimukha thakabe, niscaya tara jibana-yapana habe sankucita [1] ebam amara take kiyamatera dina jamayeta karaba andha abasthaya [2].
20|125|Se balabe, ‘he amara raba! Kena amaka andha abasthaya jamayeta karalena? Athaca ami to chilama caksusmana.
20|126|Tini balabena, ‘erupa'i amadera nidarsanabali tomara kache esechila, kintu tumi ta chere diyechile ebam sebhabe aja tomake'o (jahanname) chere rakha habe [1].’
20|127|Ara ebhabe'i amara pratiphala de'i take ye barabari kare o tara rabera nidarsane imana na ane [1]. Ara akheratera sasti to abasya'i kathinatara o adhika sthayi.

20|128|Eta'o ki taderake [1] satpatha dekhala na ye, amara edera age dhbansa karechi bahu manabagosthi yadera basabhumite era bicarana kare thake? Niscaya ete bibekasampannadera jan'ya ache nidarsana [2].
20|129|Ara apanara rabera purba sid'dhanta o ekata samaya nirdharita na thakale abasyambhabi hata asu sasti.

20|130|Kaje'i tara ya bale, se bisaye apani dhairya dharana karuna [1] ebam suryodayera age o suryastera age apanara rabera saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna ebam rate pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna ebam dinera prantasamuhe'o [2], yate apani santusta hate aprena [3].

20|131|Ara apani apanara du’cokha kakhano prasarita karabena na [1] se sabera prati, ya amara bibhinna srenike duniyara jibanera saundaryasarupa upabhogera upakarana hisebe diyechi, ta dbara taderake pariksa karara jan'ya. Ara apanara rabera doya riyika'i sarbotkrsta o adhika sthayi.

20|132|Ara apanara paribarabargake salatera adesa dina o tate abicala thakuna [1], amara apanara kache kono riyika ca'i na; amara'i apanake riyika de'i [2]. Ara subha parinama to taka'oyate'i nihita [3].
20|133|Ara tara bale, ‘se tara rabera kacha theke amadera kache kono nidarsana niye ase na kena? Tadera kache ki suspasta pramana aseni ya agekara granthasamuhe rayeche [1]

20|134|ara yadi amara taderake itopurbe sasti dbara dhbansa karatama, tabe abasya'i tara balata, ‘he amadera raba! Apani amadera kache kono rasula pathalena na kena? Pathale amara lancita o apamanita ha'oyara age apanara nidarsanabali anusarana karatama.’
20|135|Baluna, ‘pratyeke'i pratiksa karache, kaje'i tomara'o pratiksa kara [1]. Tarapara acire'i tomara janate parabe kara rayeche sarala pathe ebam kara satpatha abalambana kareche [2].’
